name: video-stitcher
description: Reco Video Stitcher Application based on Electron, FastAPI, React, Vite and Three.js

scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../electron && npm install && cd ../backend && cross-env SHELL=1 python -m venv venv && cross-env SHELL=1 venv/Scripts/python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.backend-install: cross-env SHELL=1 cd backend && venv/Scripts/python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.backend-build: cross-env SHELL=1 cd backend && pyinstaller --onefile app/main.py --name fastapi_backend --distpath ../electron/resources
scripts.build: npm run backend-build && npm run frontend-build && npm run electron-package
scripts.format: npm run format:js && npm run format:py
